Text: Greetings from TennesseeFor some strange reason I was looking at the Enron corporate listing on the MartindaleHubbell website and came across your name I hope that you are doing well Frankly I didnt know that you had left NYC but it appears that you joined the Liddell Sapp alumni crowd at Enron some time ago Things here in Nashville are quite busy Sarah and I who miraculously for reasons far beyond this short note are still married spend most of our time keeping up with our three kids Henry months old when we went to Steamboat in is now and a junior in high school He is somewhat the brilliant eccentric Laura who was born a few months before we moved in is a year old seventh grader who thus far bears the burden of being the perfect child I am sure she will get us back for that Bobby born in is a second grader who in may ways is a miniature Gordon Poor kid Oh yeah I am still an ERISA nerd All that boring stuff is on our website If you ever get up anywhere near Tennessee please come see us Best wishes Gordon Earle Nichols Boult Cummings Conners Berry PLC Union Street Suite PO Box Nashville Tennessee direct tel direct fax mobile tel Email THIS MESSAGE MAY CONTAIN PRIVILEGED ANDOR CONFIDENTIAL ATTORNEYCLIENT COMMUNICATIONS IF YOU RECEIVE THIS EMAIL IN ERROR PLEASE NOTIFY THE SENDER AND DELETE THE MESSAGE TOGETHER WITH ALL RECORDS RELATING THERETO CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and delete the contents of this message without disclosing the contents to anyone using them for any purpose or storing or copying the information on any medium
